https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/6Xi8j4WHCn6rC7k5s3GZu5n4N7g.jpg An ordinary day in the life of a community on the Santa Elena Peninsula, on the Ecuadorian coast. The many characters in this documentary –simple people, heir to an ancient culture– present the true protagonist: death. De cuando la muerte nos visitó
